clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text:
When you search, your query is automatically stripped of unnecessary metadata including your IP address and other identifying information. We send the anonymized search query to Google and return the search results to you. We don’t log your searches.


To prevent abuse such as robotic high-volume querying, we anonymously determine the frequency of popular search keywords as a part of our anti-abuse measures, while protecting your privacy

clauses.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
clauses.description: The service will attempt to protect user information to a great extent, even so far as stating that they will only follow legal requirements to disclose user information in circumstances where this cannot be reasonably resisted.
clauses.clause_text:
We will never comply with any voluntary surveillance program

Big Brother would like some help?

Hell no! Fortunately, we are based in the EU, where we have strong laws that protect your right to privacy. European governments can’t legally force service providers like Startpage to implement a blanket spying program

case.text: The service will resist legal requests for your information where reasonably possible

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text:
We don’t record your IP address
The only exception is for automated search requests (robots) that rapidly submit more queries to our servers than any normal human would. When our software detects potential abuse, we register and block the offending IP address in order to keep our service safe and free

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text:
Bad" cookies have unique elements that can track all kinds of personal information.
We don’t serve any of those.
Startpage uses just one "good" cookie called "preferences" in order to remember the search preferences you choose.
It’s completely anonymous and expires after not visiting Startpage for 90 days

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: On 2025-01-20 13:59:53 UTC, dofusports (39602) wrote: The Dofu sports APK app allows sports fans to watch live games on their Android smartphones. The NFL, NBA, NCAAF, MLB, and NHL are just a few of the leagues and tournaments that are easily accessible through this user-friendly app, which makes sports viewing enjoyable. You might use this app as a casual viewer or as a dedicated follower. You won't ever miss a play again thanks to its top-notch live streaming, real-time statistics, and customizable plans. You can support your favorite teams while learning about different sports in this entertaining multiplayer game.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text:
In accordance with EU privacy laws and regulations, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the national supervisory authority responsible for the protection of personal data if you think we have unlawfully processed your personal data.
For the Netherlands, this supervisory authority is the Dutch Data Protection Authority, which you can contact here

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
clauses.description: If a service expresses a worldview antithetical to the user’s, that is a good signal that they should not use the service. Or conversely, if the service expresses an uncommonly-held belief that the user agrees with and thinks is relevant to the service-user relationship and/or important, they may wish to use that to choose between otherwise comparable services.
clauses.clause_text:
We believe privacy is a fundamental human right. 
With Startpage you can search and browse the internet privately.  Not because you have something to hide, but because you have a lot to protect!

Protecting your privacy is all about having control over your data. At Startpage.com, we help you control and protect what’s yours: 

It’s Your Data. Not Big Data

case.text: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text:
When you contact us via email or through our support center, we’ll use your contact information to respond to you.
We won’t sell or share this info with anyone else.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: We are located in the EU, and we fully comply with applicable privacy laws and regulations of the EU, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You’ll have the option to subscribe to our newsletter, from which you can unsubscribe at any time.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties
clauses.description:
The Service only shares your information in an aggregated form, which means an anonymized form
that can't be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text:
How we have implemented truly anonymous analytics

We only count aggregate numbers

case.text: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: Any request will have to come from Dutch judicial authorities.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
